commands/index.title: Gabe Bot Commands Documentation
commands/index.description: Welcome to Gabe's command documentation! Gabe is a multi-functional Discord bot that's your pal, enemy, or both all at once.

config/index.title: Config
config/index.description: Gabe relies on a mix of environment variables and JSON files. This page explains what lives where and how each field is used.

containers/index.title: Containers
containers/index.description: You can run Gabe and its dependencies using Docker or Podman for a smoother setup. Manual installation still offers the most control, but containers reduce the amount of system configuration you need to do yourself.

custom-commands/index.title: Custom Commands
custom-commands/index.description: Gabe ships with a flexible command loaderâ€”adding new commands is as simple as dropping files into the right folder. Use this reference when building your own modules.

intro.title: Welcome
intro.description: High-level overview of Gabe bot documentation.

postgresql/index.title: PostgreSQL
postgresql/index.description: Follow these steps to provision PostgreSQL for Gabe.

runtimes/index.title: Runtime Compatibility
runtimes/index.description: Gabe targets the Node.js runtime but also runs on Deno and Bun. This page describes version requirements, behavioural differences, and known quirks when you choose an alternative runtime.

setup/index.title: Setup
setup/index.description: Here are the steps to get Gabe running from source.
